mapper.insert: INSERT INTO userNotice(noti_Num, admin_Id, noti_Title, noti_Content, noti_Top) VALUES(userNotice_seq.NEXTVAL, #{admin_Id}, #{noti_Title}, #{noti_Content}, #{noti_Top})
mapper.select: SELECT noti_Num, noti_Top, n.admin_Id, noti_Title, noti_Count, TO_CHAR(noti_Created, 'YYYY-MM-DD')noti_Created FROM userNotice n JOIN admin ad ON n.admin_Id=ad.admin_Id WHERE noti_Top=1 ORDER BY noti_Num DESC
SELECT NVL(COUNT(*), 0) FROM userNotice n JOIN admin ad ON n.admin_Id=ad.admin_Id
UPDATE userNotice SET noti_Count=noti_Count+1 WHERE noti_Num = #{noti_Num}

SELECT tb.* FROM( SELECT noti_Num, noti_Title FROM userNotice n JOIN admin ad ON n.admin_Id=ad.admin_Id
AND (noti_Num > #{noti_Num})
ORDER BY noti_Num ASC ) tb WHERE ROWNUM=1

SELECT tb.* FROM( SELECT noti_Num, noti_Title FROM userNotice n JOIN admin ad ON n.admin_Id=ad.admin_Id
AND (noti_Num < #{noti_Num})
ORDER BY noti_Num DESC ) tb WHERE ROWNUM=1
mapper.update: UPDATE userNotice SET noti_Title=#{noti_Title}, noti_Content=#{noti_Content}, noti_Top=#{noti_Top} WHERE noti_Num=#{noti_Num}
